Articles.Content:
Wow! This thread exploded already ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Keep the hype flowing!

> 
> Wait, wasn't there a countdown that someone found in the kerbal countdown that seemed unreleased to KSP besides the fact that it counted down to Monday? Where is that now?

Yeah, there was a geoguessur thing.

> 
> Yeah, there was a geoguessur thing.

I have a hunch that when that reaches zero, 1.0 will be officially released.

> 
> I have a hunch that when that reaches zero, 1.0 will be officially released.

Anybody have a link to the geoguessr thing?

Patcher error

![LAus6.png](http://i.picresize.com/images/2015/04/26/LAus6.png)
Why are they showing Ariane 5?

> 
> Anybody have a link to the geoguessr thing?

Here:

[http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

> 
> Anybody have a link to the geoguessr thing?

I'll try to find it back at the kerbal countdown thread.

Ninja'd!

> 
> Anybody have a link to the geoguessr thing?

[https://geoguessr.com/](https://geoguessr.com/)

The banner at the top of their site is all there is about it.
I found it. [https://geoguessr.com/](https://geoguessr.com/)

Must...hype..moar. I'm almost to building-a-hypetrain levels...

> 
> Quest for the HolyHypeGrail?

Pretty much ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I was reading through some pages I missed, and it was slow in times. The hype is real. I myself am also really hyped.

> 
> Here:
> [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

> 
> I'll try to find it back at the kerbal countdown thread.
> Ninja'd!

> 
> [https://geoguessr.com/](https://geoguessr.com/)
> The banner at the top of their site is all there is about it.

> 
> I found it. [https://geoguessr.com/](https://geoguessr.com/)

Well, mine's wrong, but there are plenty of options!
signing off til later
The 1.0 hype makes one hooked to the KSP forums
I actually feel confident that we could reach 200 pages before tomorrow!

> 
> I actually feel confident that we could reach 200 pages before tomorrow!

 More than likely.

The website is back online:

[https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

> 
> More than likely.

Well, it really depends on whether the hype can be sustained for as long as we need it.
Is it just me or has steamdb stopped? Update is finished?
They should figure out a release time tomorrow, so that we can have a dramatic countdown...

> 
> Is it just me or has steamdb stopped? Update is finished?

Maybe, maybe not. Could be just a momentary pause.

I just wanted to say,you guys are the best! (Yes you! The people on this forum!) I've had a blast being hyped with you guys! (and gals!) And I hope we can hype together again! **You guys are awesome!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

By the way I'm still flippin outta my chair right now.....1.0 is upon us....

> 
> The website is back online:
> [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

Not anymore. 500 internal server error.

> 
> Not anymore. 500 internal server error.

It's working for me.
